analysis.description:
Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/23/0x1fb181d0bae620c696ed0d2e2bbb532cb3f845b6.sol#338-345) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/23/0x1fb181d0bae620c696ed0d2e2bbb532cb3f845b6.sol#342-343)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x1fb181d0bae620c696ed0d2e2bbb532cb3f845b6.sol#346-453) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,numTokens) (/unique_chucks/23/0x1fb181d0bae620c696ed0d2e2bbb532cb3f845b6.sol#447-448)
